TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataObject

summary.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

span.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊`IDataObject`介面，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about the `IDataObject` interface, see the MSDN Library. 當原生程式碼的 COM 方法會傳回 HRESULT，通用語言執行平台，則會擲回例外狀況。The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public int DAdvise (ref System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC pFormatetc, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ADVF advf, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink adviseSink, out int connection);

abstract member DAdvise : * System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ADVF * System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink * -> int

param.name: pFormatetc
param.span: A structure, passed by reference, that defines the format, target device, aspect, and medium that will be used for future notifications.

span.span: A structure, passed by reference, that defines the format, target device, aspect, and medium that will be used for future notifications.

param.name: advf
param.span: One of the values that specifies a group of flags for controlling the advisory connection.

span.span: One of the values that specifies a group of flags for controlling the advisory connection.

param.name: adviseSink
param.span: A pointer to the interface on the advisory sink that will receive the change notification.

span.span: A pointer to the interface on the advisory sink that will receive the change notification.

param.name: connection
param.span: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a DWORD token that identifies this connection.

span.span: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a DWORD token that identifies this connection.

param.span: You can use this token later to delete the advisory connection by passing it to .

span.span: You can use this token later to delete the advisory connection by passing it to .

param.span: If this value is zero, the connection was not established.

span.span: If this value is zero, the connection was not established.

param.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: Creates a connection between a data object and an advisory sink.

span.span: Creates a connection between a data object and an advisory sink.

summary.span: This method is called by an object that supports an advisory sink and enables the advisory sink to be notified of changes in the object's data.

span.span: This method is called by an object that supports an advisory sink and enables the advisory sink to be notified of changes in the object's data.

returns.span:
This method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following: Value Description
S_OK The advisory connection was created.
E_NOTIMPL This method is not implemented on the data object.
DV_E_LINDEX There is an invalid value for ; currently, only -1 is supported.
DV_E_FORMATETC There is an invalid value for the parameter.
OLE_E_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED The data object does not support change notification.

span.span:
This method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following: Value Description
S_OK The advisory connection was created.
E_NOTIMPL This method is not implemented on the data object.
DV_E_LINDEX There is an invalid value for ; currently, only -1 is supported.
DV_E_FORMATETC There is an invalid value for the parameter.
OLE_E_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED The data object does not support change notification.
